results.content: I was not expecting such a thorough and in depth ( real world) example of a go web app. Trevor did a great job with vigilate. This course is great for those whom are cross skilling from node to go - as is in may case. There is really no need to buy another. Thx Trevor for a job well done.
results.content_html: I was not expecting such a thorough and in depth ( real world) example of a go web app. Trevor did a great job with vigilate. This course is great for those whom are cross skilling from node to go - as is in may case. There is really no need to buy another. Thx Trevor for a job well done.

results.content: This is an awesome course on Go WebSockets where we build a practical useful project which has real application beyond the course.
results.content_html: This is an awesome course on Go WebSockets where we build a practical useful project which has real application beyond the course.

results.content:
Good course. Not an easy course. The first project is very good (5 stars). Gives you everything to start with websockets and go. The second project is way too complicated. After hours of coding you come back again to websockets. 

Take his "Building web applications with Go" first. The second project will then be much easier to follow.
results.content_html:

results.content: great introduction of Websockets in action using Go!
results.content_html: great introduction of Websockets in action using Go!

results.content: The course is alright if your expectation is learning about websockets. However, there aren't much explanation on what some codes actually do.
results.content_html: The course is alright if your expectation is learning about websockets. However, there aren't much explanation on what some codes actually do.

results.content: Wow moves fast but it's great. Not recommended for brand-new GoLang learners, but if you have some comfort in the language, this is great.
results.content_html: Wow moves fast but it's great. Not recommended for brand-new GoLang learners, but if you have some comfort in the language, this is great.
